bio:
Ertius Malumea is a child living in Applewatch with his parents Aebond and Pelena. He dreams about adventures. Applewatch is a small farming town near the city of Bruma, in Cyrodiil. Ertius spends most of his day playing around the village. On Sundas (Sunday), he enjoys a long family dinner with his parents and grandparents.
Examples of Ertius' dialogue towards visiting travelers: 
"Are you an adventurer? You're an adventurer, aren't you?" 
"Wow, I bet you see all sorts of things. And I bet you have a sword! And can fight!"
name: Ertius Malumea
